entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-31
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Add ProjectInfo.WithId #74665
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35230.56 #74964

Updated

  • [API Proposal]: `Concat` support for `IncrementalValuesProvider<T>` #74585
    17.13
  • [Analyzer Proposal]: Replace `.Where(x => x is T)` for `.OfType<T>()` #74968

PullRequests

Created

  • Filter type parameters in where clause #74970
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Partial properties: duplicate `membersByName` before merging accessors #74969
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Semantic snippets: handle case with inline statement snippets before member access expression #74966
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Remove usages of `#if CODE_STYLE` where possible. #74958
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add NFW tracking to Solution.RemoveProjectReference #74965
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add ProjectInfo.WithId public API #74664
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, Next
  • Use ignore case to fix analyzer reloading in devkit #74963
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Collection expressions: nullable analysis of spread element expression #74686
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Optimize single spread collection expression for `List<T>` #74769
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Improve support for TypeLibFuncFlags.FHidden attributed properties. #74962
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
